text:
M. S. Novik
January 31 j 1955
Frank:
Next time we meet, remind me to prove
to you that you are dead wrong about your
doubt that I "would have enjoyed the clipping
so much if the similar situation would have
happened to Harry or Adlai."
You know how I always felt about blended
whisky and straight bourbon. I feel the same
way about my politics and my public service,.
MSN:ck
